title: Hamburg: 90-Minute Evening Lights Harbor Cruise
meeting_point: Meet your cruise operator at Landungsbrücken, Bridge 10 and show your voucher to a staff member at the booth of the local partner, Maritime Circle Line, to pick up your boarding pass.

title: Hamburg: 1.5-Hour Harbor and Speicherstadt Day Cruise
meeting_point: Once at the Überseebrücke bridge, start to walk down. Through the windows of the bridge, you will be able to see the boat on the left side of the bridge.

title: Hamburg: Line A Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Tour
meeting_point: Hop onto the bus at the Central Station/Kirchenallee, St. Pauli Landungsbrücken 1-2, or any of the other 20 stops on the tour. Look for the red double-decker Hamburger Stadtrundfahrt bus. Please check our website (die-roten-doppeldecker.de) for information about timetable changes and stop relocations

title: Hamburg: Moviegolf Experience

title: Hamburg Dungeon Admission Ticket
meeting_point: The Hamburg Dungeon is situated in the heart of Hamburg, in the middle of the famous "Hamburger Speicherstadt", near the Hamburg harbor. It is only a few minutes walk away from the S-Bahn station Stadthausbrücke or the U-Bahn stations Baumwall or Überseequartier.

title: Hamburg: 1.5-Hour Evening Lights Harbour Cruise on a Ship
meeting_point: Meet by pier 3 at Landungsbrücken and look for the local partner.

title: Hamburg: 2-Hour XXL Port of Hamburg Cruise Tour
meeting_point: Please arrive at the agreed meeting point on time and ask the staff of Rainer Abicht Elbreederei where the ship will depart from. The ships may depart from St. Pauli Landungsbrücken, Bridge 1 or Bridges 4-10. Please check with the staff on site.

title: Hamburg: Port des Lumières Vermeer & Van Gogh
meeting_point:
Port des Lumières, Platz am 10. Längengrad 1 at Westfield Überseequartier in HafenCity
20457 Hamburg

Port des Lumières is located directly at the entrance to Westfield Überseequartier in HafenCity – you'll find our entrance at the corner of Osakaallee / Überseeallee / Magdeburger Brücke.

title: Hamburg: Hamburg City Card with Free Public Transportation
meeting_point: There is no need to exchange your HamburgCard. You can use the card directly on public transit or at any of the participating attractions.

title: Hamburg: St. Pauli Comedy Club
meeting_point:
Herzlich Willkommen im St. Pauli Comedy Club

Wir befinden uns grade im Umbruch und es kommt was tolles auf euch zu. Doch leider hat das zur Folge, dass wir den St. Pauli Comedy Club, ab sofort bis zur Fertigstellung des neuen Clubs, vorübergehend ins Hause des Reeperbahn Comedy Club verlegen müssen.


Alle unsere Shows aktuell:
Reeperbahn Comedy Club
Reeperbahn 25
20359 Hamburg

title: Hamburg: Reeperbahn tour with Daniel Schmidt from the Elbschlosskeller

We are on site and welcome our guests personally.
Rendsburger Straße 4 20359 Hamburg

title: Hamburg: Night Watchman's Tour of St. Pauli in German
meeting_point:
Meet your guide on the pedestrian bridge, located right outside the main exit of Landungsbrücken S-bahn and U-bahn station. Your guide will be wearing a nightguard costume.

If you arrive by train (underground or regular), please use the main exit to walk onto the bridge.

title: Hamburg: Schanzenviertel Culinary Tour
meeting_point: Meeting point may vary depending on the option booked.

title: Hamburg: 1-Hour Evening Harbor Lights Cruise
meeting_point: The departure of the evening Lights cruise starts at St. Pauli Landungsbrücken, Bridge 4. You will find the ship and the boarding area down by the water on the pontoon. You can also find Rainer Abicht staff members at Bridge 1 and Bridge 2 who can assist you. Please have your ticket ready as it will be scanned by the staff member at the gangway.

title: Hamburg: Elbphilharmonie Highlights and Plaza Guided Tour
meeting_point:
Meet at the bus stop for the blue line, across from the old water police building. Your guide will be wearing a white shoulder bag with UNSER HAMBURG written on it.
Attention: The meeting point is about 300 meters from the Elbphilharmonie.

title: Hamburg: Speicherstadt and Hafencity Guided Tour
meeting_point: The meeting point is directly at Sandtorkai 74. This is the corner of Sandtorkai/Kaiserkai and there directly on the square in front of the stairs and on the white wall with the hole in the middle.

title: Ticket to the Panoptikum Waxworks
meeting_point:
Ticket office of the Panoptikum
Spielbudenplatz 3, 20359 Hamburg

Directions by public transport:
St. Pauli station (U3 metro line) and Reeperbahn station (S1 and S3 train lines) are within walking distance. Buses 6, 36, 37, 112, 601, 607, 608, 609, and 688 stop at St. Pauli station.

title: Hamburg: Harbor Cruise
meeting_point:
Departure:

Our boats are located at the Pontonanlage in the Binnenhafen on the streets Kajen and Hohe Brücke, opposite the Miniatur Wunderland in the Speicherstadt. You reach the pontoon from the bridge Kehrwiedersteg.

Parking for cars and buses are available.

The nearest metro station is Baumwall with the U3 line.

Metronom Trainstation Hittfeld (15min from Central Station) We are the last station included HVV Ticket.

title: Hamburg: Neighborhood tour with an ex-dominatrix
meeting_point:
We'll meet outside Mary's Treff at Gerhardstraße 1. You'll recognize the shop by the eye-catching red Tyskie sign – right next to it is the Hotel Hanseport.

If you're coming from Hans-Albers-Platz, just walk down Gerhardstraße to the very end – then you'll be there.
